verbose_text: In addition, neutralization of fVIIa in microvesicles derived from 786-O and HepG2 cells, using an inhibitory anti-fVIIa antibody, prevented the promotion of cell apoptosis in response to 786-O-derived microvesicles (XREF_FIG) and also the increased cell numbers by HepG2 derived microvesicles (XREF_FIG), respectively.
evidence: fVIIa in microvesicles derived from 786-O and HepG2 cells, using an inhibitory anti-fVIIa antibody, prevented the promotion of cell apoptosis
